谁是我？

荷兰的冒险

>

在这个网站我想分享我的冒险经历发生在荷兰。

荷兰的风景

所谓四合, “四” 指东、西、南、北四面,
Suǒwèi sì hé, “sì” zhǐ dōng, xī, nán, běi sìmiàn,
The so-called "four-in-one" refers to the east, west, south, and north sides.

“合” 就是四面房屋围在一起,
“hé” jiùshì sìmiàn fángwū wéi zài yīqǐ,
"combined" means that houses on all sides are surrounded by houses

中间形成一个方形的院子。
zhōngjiān xíngchéng yīgè fāngxíng de yuànzi.
forming a square yard in the middle.

四合院在中国汉族民居中历史最悠久,
Sìhéyuàn zài zhōngguó hànzú mínjū zhōng lìshǐ zuì yōujiǔ, fēnbù zuì guǎngfàn.
Siheyuan has the longest history and the most widespread distribution among the dwellings of the Han nationality in China.

不过, 只要人们一提到四合院,
Bùguò, zhǐyào rénmen yī tí dào sìhéyuàn,
However, when people mention Siheyuan,

便自然会想到北京四合院,
biàn zìrán huì xiǎngdào běijīng sìhéyuàn,
they will naturally think of Beijing Siheyuan.

这是因为传统的北京四合院都有一套固定的样式,
zhè shì yīnwèi chuántǒng de běijīng sìhéyuàn dōu yǒuyī tào gùdìng de yàngshì,
This is because the traditional Beijing Siheyuan has a set of fixed styles,

十分具有代表性,
shífēn jùyǒu dàibiǎo xìng,
which is very representative.

在各种各样的四合院中,
zài gè zhǒng gè yàng de sìhéyuàn zhōng,
Among all kinds of Siheyuan,

北京四合院可以代表其主要特点。
Běijīng sìhéyuàn kěyǐ dàibiǎo qí zhǔyào tèdiǎn.
Beijing Siheyuan can represent its main Features.

大宝

4

北京有各种规模的四合院。 Běijīng yǒu gè zhǒng guīmó de sìhéyuàn. There are courtyards of various sizes in Beijing. 最简单的四合院只有一个院子, Zuì jiǎndān de sìhéyuàn zhǐyǒu yīgè yuànzi, The simplest quadrangle courtyard has only one courtyard, 比较复杂的有两三个, bǐjiào fùzá de yǒu liǎng sān gè, and the more complicated ones have two or three, 而有钱人家的, ér yǒu qián rénjiā de, while those of the rich are 通常是由好几座四合院并列组成的。 tōngcháng shì yóu hǎojǐ zuò sìhéyuàn bìngliè zǔchéng de. usually composed of several quadrangular courtyards side by side. 大门一般开在东南角或西北角, Dàmén yībān kāi zài dōngnán jiǎo huò xīběi jiǎo, The gate generally opens in the southeast or northwest corner. 院中的北房是正房, yuàn zhōng de běi fáng shìzhèng fáng, The north house in the courtyard is the main house, 比其他房屋的规模大, bǐ qítā fángwū de guī mú dà, which is larger in scale than other houses. 一般包括长辈的卧室 yībān bāokuò zhǎngbèi de wòshì It generally includes the elder's bedroom 和具备日常起居、 hé jùbèi rìcháng qǐjū, and the living room 接待客人等功能的客厅。 jiēdài kèrén děng gōngnéng de kètīng. with functions such as daily living and receiving guests. 院子的两边是东西厢房, Yuànzi de liǎngbiān shì dōngxī xiāngfáng, On both sides of the yard are east and west wing rooms, 是晚辈们生活的地方。 shì wǎnbèimen shēnghuó de dìfāng. where the younger generation lives. 在正房和厢房之间建有走廊, Zài zhèng fáng hé xiāngfáng zhī jiān jiàn yǒu zǒuláng, There is a corridor between the main room and the wing room 可以供人行走和休息。 kěyǐ gōng rén xíngzǒu hé xiūxí. for people to walk and rest. 院子是十分理想的室外生活空间。 Yuànzi shì shí fèn lǐxiǎng de shìwài shēnghuó kōngjiān. The yard is an ideal outdoor living space. 有的人家喜欢种草、养花、种竹子, Yǒu de rénjiā xǐhuan zhǒng cǎo, yǎng huā, zhǒng zhúzi, Some people like to grow grass, flowers, and bamboo, 有的人家则喜欢用大盆养金鱼。 yǒu de rénjiā zé xǐhuan yòng dà pén yǎng jīnyú. while others like to raise goldfish in large pots. 院子不仅拉近了人与自然的关系, Yuànzi bùjǐn lā jìnle rén yǔ zìrán de guānxì, The yard not only closes the relationship between man and nature, 也让家里人在此得到了感情的交流, yě ràng jiālǐ rén zài cǐ dédàole gǎnqíng de jiāoliú, but also allows family members to get emotional exchanges here, 对创造生活情趣起了很大作用, duì chuàngzào shēnghuó qíngqù qǐle hěn dà zuòyòng, which plays a great role in creating the interest of life, 因而最为人们所喜爱。
yīn'ér zuìwéi rénmen suǒ xǐ'ài. so it is most loved by people.

荷兰的城市

Zhǐyào guānbì qǐ dàmén, 只要关闭起大门, As long as the gate is closed, sìhéyuàn nèi biàn xíngchéng yīgè fēngbì shì de xiǎo huánjìng. 四合院内便形成一个封闭式的小环境。 a closed small environment is formed in the courtyard. Zhù zài sìhéyuàn lǐ de rén 住在四合院里的人 People who live in courtyards bù cháng yǔ zhōuwéi de línjū dǎjiāodào. 不常与周围的邻居打交道。 don't often deal with neighbors around them. Zài xiǎo yuàn lǐ, 在小院里, In the small courtyard, yījiā rénguòzhe yǔ shì wú zhēng de rìzi, 一家人过着与世无争的日子, the family leads a life inconsistent with the world chōngfèn xiǎngshòu jiātíng de lèqù, 充分享受家庭的乐趣, and fully enjoys the fun of the family, zìrán yǒuyī zhǒng lìng rén gǎndào zìzài qīnqiè de qìfēn. 自然有一种令人感到自在亲切的气氛。 naturally there is a kind of comfortable and friendly atmosphere. Dàn yěyǒu duō hù hé zhù yīzuò sìhéyuàn de qíngkuàng, 但也有多户合住一座四合院的情况, However, there are also cases where multiple households live in a quadrangle courtyard, bèi chēng wèi “dàzáyuàn”, 被称为 “大杂院”, which is called a "large compound courtyard", zhùhù duō wèi pǔtōng láodòng rénmín. 住戶多为普通劳动人民。 and the residents are mostly ordinary working people. Línlǐ zhī jiān yǒushí suīrán yěyǒu máodùn, 邻里之间有时虽然也有矛盾, Although sometimes there are conflicts between neighbors, dàn gèng duō shíhòu shì hù bāng hùzhù, 但更多时候是互帮互助, but more often they help each other, bùshì qīnrén shèngguò qīnrén, 不是亲人胜过亲人, not relatives are better than loved ones, zhè zhǒng nóng nóng de qínggǎn shì xǔduō lǎo běijīng rén wúfǎ wàngjì de. 这种浓浓的情感是许多老北京人无法忘记的。 this kind of strong emotion is not forgotten by many old Beijingers.
